rupiyal koti 127kata aasanna mudalak wayakota me wasare basnahira palathe marga wadi diyunu kirimata palath marga sanwardhana adhikariya piyawara gena thibe.mema mudalin rupiyal koti 60 ka mudalak waya karanuye marga nadaththuwata ha punaruththapanaya sandaha ya.thawath koti 52 kata adhika mudalak margawala thaththwaya wadidiyunu kirima sandaha yedawimata niyamitha athara, palath palana aayathana yatathe palanaya wana marga sandaha rupiyal koti 14 ka mudalak yedawimata niyamithaya.gewigiya warshawaladi (2011/ 2012) rupiyal dasa laksha 14,289 k waya kota basnahira palathe kilo mitar 1086 ka marga sanwardhanaya kara thibe.mewa athara “ayawaya yojana” ha “ran aruna 2” yana wadasatahan yatathe marga sanwardhanaya kirimata palath marga sanwardhana adhikariya piyawara gena athi athara, rupiyal koti 40 kata adhika mudalak waya karamin swasthatha manthiru 7k idikirimata da adhikariya katayuthu kara atha.
